greenbananas.game.physics

Class PhysicsLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenbananas.game.physics.PhysicsShape
      • greenbananas.game.physics.PhysicsLine

  • public class PhysicsLine
extends PhysicsShape
    Represents a line with physics

      • getNormalVelocityVector

        public double[] getNormalVelocityVector(double vx,
                                        double vy)
        Calculates the resultant velocity vector of an object colliding with the line
        Parameters:
        vx - The x component of the initial velocity of the object
        vy - The y component of the initial velocity of the object
        Returns:
        An array, in [x,y] order, of the resulting velocity of a collision
